thread.title: Egypt: Planning Ministry - Growth Rate Hits 3 Percent in 2014-2015 Q3
thread.title_full: Egypt: Planning Ministry - Growth Rate Hits 3 Percent in 2014-2015 Q3

title: Egypt: Planning Ministry - Growth Rate Hits 3 Percent in 2014-2015 Q3
text:
Egypt: 6 Civilians Killed in Three Attacks in North Sinai - Sources 
Egypt's growth rate hit 3% during the period between January-March of the financial year 2014/2015 compared with 2.5% during the same quarter of FY 2013/2014, the Planning Ministry said. 
The Ministry mentioned that the economic growth rate hit 4.7% during the period between July-March 2014/2015 compared with 1.6% in the same period of the previous year. 
Unemployment rate reached 12.8% in the nine-month period, while youth unemployment declined to 32.8%, the ministry said in a report. 
The budget deficit hit 9.4% of the gross domestic product in the prescribed period, the report added. 
The deficit in the balance of trade recorded $29.6 billion, while deficit in the balance of payments hit one billion dollars, it added. Egypt
